June 12, 1981 D Lydgate (Whit Friday)
Lydgate (Whit Friday) 0 March Contest Whit Friday Saddleworth lydgate-whit-friday
White Hart Inn, Lydgate Best local - Stalybridge. Best Saddleworth - Boarshurst. Best cornet - Fairey. Best euphonium - Boarshurst. Best youth - Glossop School. Best trombones - Marlyn Homes. 38 bands competed.
